snippet.title: Little Ghosthunter | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Little Ghosthunter is a puzzle adventure game about friendly ghosts. Uncover the stories behind a family of ghosts to free them from the confines of their own house, as you search for a way to summon your best friend from the afterlife.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2384680/Little_Ghosthunter/?beta=0
